item.name: InvalidVersionError
item.original:
The database has version {0} but the largest supported version is {1}.
This is likely caused by upgrading to a newer version and then downgrading. If this is the case, there is likely a backup file of the previous database version in the folder {2}.
item.translated:
Database har version {0} men der understøttes kun version {1}.
Dette skyldes formentlig en opgradering og en følgende nedgradering. Hvis dette er tilfældet findes der formentlig en backup af den forrige database i mappen {2}.

item.translated: Genoptager Duplicati kørsel, hvis Duplicati var på pause

item.name: RunbackupCommandDescription
item.original: Runs the backup with the name supplied. If no backup name is supplied, the available backups are displayed
item.translated: Kører backup'en med det angivne navn. Hvis der ikke angives et navn vises de tilgængelige backup'er.

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you can select more advanced settings for your backup. If you prefer, you can ignore those settings, and use the duplicati defaults.
item.translated: På denne side kan du angive avancerede indstillinger for din backup. Du kan ignorere denne side hvis du ønsker at anvende standardindstillingerne.

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Advanced settings

item.name: DisabledCleanupWarning
item.original: You have disabled backup removal. If no backups are removed, the amount of stored data will increase forever. Disabling backup cleanup may result in storage space being exhausted. Do you want to continue without backup removal backups?
item.translated: Du har deaktiveret fjernelse af backup data. Hvis der ikke fjernes backup data, vil mængden af data blive ved med at stige. Dette kan bevirke at destinationen løber tør for plads. Vil du fortsætte uden fjernelse af backup data?

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: To ensure that backups do not grow indefinately, Duplicati can automatically remove old backups.
item.translated: Duplicati kan automatisk fjerne gamle backup data for at hindre et voksende pladsforbrug.

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Select cleanup options

item.name: TooShortCleanupDurationDay
item.original: The cleanup duration entered is less than 1 day. This will give very poor system performance.
item.translated: Du har angivet mindre end én dag mellem oprydning. Dette vil medføre dårlig ydelse.

item.name: TooShortFullDuration
item.original: The full backup duration entered is less than ten minutes. This will give very poor system performance.
item.translated: Intervallet mellem fuld backup er mindre end 10 minutter. Dette vil medføre dårlig ydelse.

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you can modify filters that control what files are included in the backup.
item.translated: På denne side kan du redigere filtre der angiver hvilke filer der medtages i backup'en.

item.original: Edit filters

item.name: EmptyPasswordError
item.original: You must enter a password, remove the check mark next to the box to disable encryption of the backups.
item.translated: Du skal angive et kodeord. Fjern afkrydsningen ud for feltet for at deaktivere kryptering

item.name: EnablePasswordRestoreText
item.original: Backup is protected with password
item.translated: Backup'en er beskyttet med et kodeord

item.name: EncryptionModuleLoadError
item.original: Failed to load the encryption modules: {0}

item.name: NewGeneratedPasswordWarning
item.original:
You have generated a new random password. Please write down the password and store it in a safe location. Without this password, you will not be able to recover a single file from the backups!
You cannot recover the password from within Duplicati after saving this setup.
Are you sure you have a safely stored copy of the generated password?
item.translated:
Du har dannet et nyt tilfældigt kodeord. Skriv venligst dette kodeord ned og gem det et sikkert sted. Uden dette kodeord kan du ikke gendanne en eneste fil fra backup'en!
Du kan ikke få oplyst kodeordet fra Duplicati efter du har gemt opsætningen.
Er du sikker på du har gemt en kopi af det dannede kodeord?

item.name: NoEncryptionMethodSelected
item.original: You must select an encryption method.

item.name: NoPasswordWarning
item.original: If the backup is stored on machine or device that is not under your direct control, it is possible that others may view the files you have stored in the backups. It is highly recomended that you enable encryption. Do you want to continue without encryption?
item.translated: Hvis denne backup gemmes på en maskine eller enhed du ikke har fuld kontrol over, er der en mulighed for at andre kan læse de filer du har taget backup af. Det anbefales kraftigt at du aktiverer kryptering. Vil du fortsætte uden kryptering?

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you can select options that protect your backups from being read or altered.
item.translated: På denne side kan du indstille din backup således at den ikke kan læses eller ændres af andre.

item.name: PageDescriptionRestore
item.original: Enter the encryption settings that were used to create the backup originally
item.translated: Indtast de krypteringsoplysninger der blev anvendt da backup'en blev oprettet.

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Select password for the backup

item.name: PasswordChangedWarning
item.original: ****************** WARNING *********************** You are modifying the password settings for an existing backup. If you save these changes, you will no longer be able to recover previously backed up files. Are you absolutely sure you want to continue?
item.translated: ****************** ADVARSEL *********************** Du ændrer kodeordet for en eksisterende backup. Hvis du gemmer disse ændringer kan du ikke længere gendanne filer der tidligere er taget backup af. Er du helt sikker på at du vil fortsætte?

item.name: CalculatingSize
item.original: Calculating size ...

item.name: DuplicateFolderError
item.original: The folder "{0}" is included twice

item.name: FinalSizeCalculated
item.original: The selected items take up {0} of space

item.name: FolderDoesNotExistWarning
item.original: The folder "{0}" does not exist. How do you want to proceed?
item.translated: Mappen "{0}" findes ikke. Hvordan vil du fortsætte?

item.name: NoFilesSelectedError
item.original: You have not included any files.
item.translated: Du har ikke inkluderet nogen filer

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you must select the folder and files you wish to backup
item.translated: På denne side skal du angive hvilke filer du ønsker at tage backup af

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Select files to backup

item.name: PartialSizeCalculated
item.original: Calculating ... (using more than {0} of space)

item.name: RelatedFoldersError
item.original: The folder "{0}" is a subfolder of "{1}", which is not allowed
item.translated: Mappen "{0}" er en undermappe til "{1}", hvilket ikke tillades

item.name: UpgradeWarning
item.original: The setup is loaded from an older version of Duplicati. If you save the backup settings, the internal storage will be change to the new version. Please verify the content of the backup after the next run to ensure that it contains the files and folders that you expect.
item.translated: Opsætningen er indlæst fra en tidligere udgave af Duplicati. Hvis du gemmer opsætningen vil opsætningen gemmes i et nyt format. Kontroller venligst indholdet af næste backup, for at sikre at denne indeholder de forventede filer.

item.name: DuplicateNameEnteredError
item.original: There already exists a backup with that name
item.translated: Der findes allerede en backup med samme navn

item.name: InvalidNameEnteredError
item.original: Failed to validate the backup name: {0}

item.name: NoNameEnteredError
item.original: You must enter a name for the backup
item.translated: Du skal angive et navn til backup'en

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you can enter a name for the backup, so you can find and modify it later
item.translated: På denne side kan du indtaste et navn til backup'en så du kan finde og redigere den senere

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Enter a name for the backup

item.name: FullDurationShorterThanScheduleDurationError
item.original: The interval between each full backup must be larger than the schedule interval.
item.translated: Intervallet mellem hver fuld backup skal være større end gentagelses intervallet

item.name: NoScheduleWarning
item.original:
You have selected not to run the backup automatically. This means that you have to remember to manually start the backup periodically.
Are you sure this is what you want?
item.translated:
Du har angivet at backup'en ikke skal køre automatisk. Dette betyder at du skal huske at starte backup'en manuelt en gang i mellem.
Er du sikke på at det er det du ønsker?

item.name: OnlyFullBackupsWarning
item.original:
You have selected to only produce full backups. This may take up a lot of space on the backend.
Are you sure this is what you want?
item.translated:
Du har angivet at der kun skal dannes fulde backup'er. Dette kan bruge en forholdsvist stor mængde data på destinationen.
Er du sikke på at det er det du ønsker?

item.name: OnlyIncrementalBackupsWarning
item.original:
You have selected to only produce incremental backups. This may result in very lengthy restore operations, and increases the probability of a restore failure.
Are you sure this is what you want?
item.translated:
Du har valgt at kun danne trinvise backup'er. Dette kan resultere i en meget lang gendannelsesprocedure, og øger sandsynligheden for gendannelsesfejl.
Er du sikke på at det er det du ønsker?

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you may set up when the backup is run. Automatically repeating the backup ensure that you have a backup, without requiring any action from you.
item.translated: På denne side kan du vælge hvornår backup'en kører. Ved at automatisk køre backup'en kan du sikre dig at du har en backup, uden at du selv skal foretage dig noget.

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Select when the backup should run

item.name: TimeIsInThePastWarning
item.original: The time you entered is in the past.
item.translated: Tiden du har angivet er i fortiden.

item.name: TimeOccursShortlyWarning

This option can be used to store some or all of the options given to the commandline client. The file must be a plain text file, UTF-8 encoding is preferred. Each line in the file should be of the format --option=value. The special options --source and --target can be used to override the localpath and the remote destination uri, respectively. The options in this file take precedence over the options provided on the commandline. You cannot specify filters in both the file and on the commandline.

item.name: ProgramUsageBackend
item.original: A <backend> is identified by an url like ftp://host/ or ssh://server/. Using this system, Duplicati can detect if you want to backup or restore. The cleanup and delete commands do not delete files, unless the --force option is specified, so you may examine what files are affected, before actually deleting the files. The cleanup command should not be used unless a backup was interrupted and has left partial files. Duplicati will inform you if this happens. The delete command can be used to remove backup sets when newer backups are present.
item.translated: En <backend> genkendes ved en url, såsom ftp://host/ eller ssh://server/. Ved at bruge dette system kan Duplicati afgøre om der skal tages en backup eller gendannes filer. Kommandoerne til oprydning og sletning, fjerner ikke filer medmindre indstillingen --force er sat, så du kan undersøge hvilke filer der bliver slettet, før de rent faktisk bliver slettet. Oprydningskommandoen bør ikke bruges medmindre en backup blev afbrudt og der derfor er delvise efterladte filer. Duplicati vil vise en besked hvis dette er sket. Kommandoen til sletning kan bruges til at fjerne gamle backup sæt efterhånden som nyere backup sæt dannes.

item.name: ProgramUsageBackup
item.original: Backup (make a full or incremental backup): Duplicati.CommandLine [full] [options] <sourcefolder> <backend>
item.translated: Backup (udfør en fuld eller trinvis backup): Duplicati.CommandLine [full] [options] <kilde mappe> <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageCleanup
item.original: Cleanup (remove partial and unused files): Duplicati.CommandLine cleanup [options] <backend>
item.translated: Oprydning (fjern delvise og ubrugte filer): Duplicati.CommandLine cleanup [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageCreateFolders
item.original: Create folder (usually done automatically): Duplicati.CommandLine create-folder [options] <backend>
item.translated: Opret mappe (gøres normalt automatisk): Duplicati.CommandLine create-folder [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageDeleteOld
item.original: Delete old backups: Duplicati.CommandLine delete-all-but-n-full <number of full backups to keep> [options] <backend> Duplicati.CommandLine delete-older-than <max allowed age> [options] <backend>
item.translated: Slet gamle backup sæt: Duplicati.CommandLine delete-all-but-n-full <number of full backups to keep> [options] <backend> Duplicati.CommandLine delete-older-than <max allowed age> [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageFilters
item.original:
Filters: Duplicati uses filters to include and exclude files. Duplicati uses a "first-touch" filter where the first rule that matches a file determines if the file is included or excluded. Internally Duplicati uses regular expression filters, but supports filters in the form of filename globbing. The order of the commandline arguments also determine what order they are applied in. An example: --include=*.txt --exclude=*\Thumbs.db --include=*
Even though the last filter includes everything, no files named "Thumbs.db" are included because they match the exclude rule before the include rule. Paths are evaluated in full, and as paths that are relative to folder being backed up, but including a leading slash. An example:
{0} If a folder is excluded, files in that folder are always excluded, even if there are filters that include files in that folder. If a folder is included with a wildcard at the end, all files are included, if the folder is included without a wildcard, files may be excluded or included with extra rules.
item.translated:
Filtre: Duplicati bruger filtre til at inkludere og ekskludere filer. Duplicati bruger et "første match" system, hvor det først matchende filter angiver om en fil inkluderes eller ekskluderes. Internt anvender Duplicati regulære udtryk som filtre, men understøtter filtre i fil-globbing formatet. Rækkefølgen af filtrene på kommandolinien angiver hvilken rækkefølge de anvendes i. Et eksempel: --include=*.txt --exclude=*\Thumbs.db --include=*
Selvom det sidste filter inkluderer alt, bliver ingen filer med navnet "Thumbs.db" inkluderet, fordi de matcher ekskluderingsreglen før inkluderingsreglen. Stier evalueres i deres fulde format, og som stier der er relative til kildemappen, men inklusiv en foranstillet skråstreg. Et eksempel:
{0} Hvis en mappe er ekskluderet bliver alle filer i den mappe altid ekskluderet, også selvom der er filtre der inkluederer filer i mappen. Hvis mappen inkluderes med et efterfølgende wildcard, bliver alle filer i mappen inkluderet. Hvis mappen inkluderes uden et wildcard, kan filer inkluderes eller ekskluderes med ekstra filtre.

item.name: ProgramUsageFindLastVersion
item.original: Find the last version of a file: Duplicati.CommandLine find-last-version [options] --file-to-restore=<files to find> <backend>
item.translated: Find sidste version af en fil: Duplicati.CommandLine find-last-version [options] --file-to-restore=<files to find> <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageListContentFiles
item.original: List content files (files that can be restored): Duplicati.CommandLine list-current-files [options] <backend>
item.translated: Liste med indhold (filer der kan gendannes): Duplicati.CommandLine list-current-files [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageListFiles
item.original: List files: Duplicati.CommandLine list [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageListSets
item.original: List backup sets: Duplicati.CommandLine collection-status [options] <backend>
item.translated: Liste med backup sæt: Duplicati.CommandLine collection-status [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageListSignatureFiles
item.original: List signature files (files in a single backup volume set): Duplicati.CommandLine list-actual-signature-files [options] <backend>
item.translated: Liste med signature filer (filer i et enkelt backup sæt): Duplicati.CommandLine list-actual-signature-files [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageListSourceFolders
item.original: List source folders (folders backed up from): Duplicati.CommandLine list-source-folders [options] <backend>
item.translated: Liste med kildemapper (mapper der er taget backup af): Duplicati.CommandLine list-source-folders [options] <backend>

item.name: ProgramUsageOptionTypes
item.original: Option types: The following option types are available: Integer: a numerical value Boolean: a truth value, --force and --force=true are equivalent. --force=false is the opposite Timespan: a time in the special time format (explained below) Size: a size like 5mb or 200kb Enumeration: any of the listed values Path: the path to a folder or file String: any other type
item.translated: Indstillings typer: Der findes følgende indstillingstyper: Heltal: en numerisk værdi Boolsk værdi: en sandhedsværdi, --force og --force=true er det samme. --force=false er det modsatte Tidsinterval: en tid angivet i det specielle tidsformat (beskrevet herunder) Størrelse: en størrelse, såsom 5mb eller 200kb Valgmulighed: en af de angivne muligheder Sti: stien til en mappe eller fil Tekst: enhver anden type

item.name: ProgramUsagePurgeCache
item.original: Purge signature cache: Duplicati.CommandLine purge-signature-cache [options]

item.name: ProgramUsageRestore
item.original: Restore (restore all or some files): Duplicati.CommandLine [options] <backend> <destinationfolder>
item.translated: Gendan (gendan alle eller nogle filer): Duplicati.CommandLine [options] <backend> <destinationsmappe>

item.name: ProgramUsageTimes
item.original: Times: Duplicati uses the time system from duplicity, where times may be presented as: 1: the string "now", indicating the current time 2: the number of seconds after epoch, eg: 123456890 3: a string like "2009-03-26T08:30:00+01:00" 4: an interval string, using Y, M, W, D, h, m, s for Year, Month, Week, Day, hour, minute or second, eg: "1M4D" for one month and four days, or "5m" for five minutes.
item.translated: Tider: Duplicati bruger samme tidssystem som duplicity, hvor tider kan angives som: 1: teksten "now", som angiver det nuværende tidspunkt 2: antallet af sekunder efter epoch, f.eks.: 123456890 3: en tekst såsom "2009-03-26T08:30:00+01:00" 4: en interval tekst med Y, M, W, D, h, m, s for År, Måned, Uge, Dag, time, minut og sekund, f.eks.: "1M4D" for en måned og fire dage, eller "5m" for fem minutter.

item.name: ProgramUsageVerify
item.original: Verify backup integrity: Duplicati.CommandLine verify <backend> --verification-level=manifest|signatures|full

I dette eksempel bliver filen "/home/user/file.txt" ekskluderet.

Duplicati.CommandLine C:\Documents\Files ftp://host/folder --exclude=\file.txt
In this example the file "C:\Documents\Files\file.txt" is excluded.
item.translated:
Duplicati.CommandLine C:\Documents\Files ftp://host/folder --exclude=\file.txt
I dette eksempel bliver filen "C:\Documents\Files\file.txt" ekskluderet.

item.name: DeleteTransactionFileFoundWarning
item.original: A delete operation was started, but failed to complete. Next invocation of a cleanup or delete command will complete the transaction.
item.translated: En slette operation blev startet, men ikke afsluttet. Næste gang der køres en "cleanup" eller slette kommando bliver transaktionen fuldført.

item.name: DeleteTransactionFileReadError
item.original:
A previously started delete operation was not completed, but the attempt to recover the operation details failed with the message: {1}.
If this problem happens more than once, it is possible that the delete transaction file is defect. Try renaming the file "{0}" and the run the operation again. If no errors are reported, it is safe to delete the file, otherwise Duplicati will report what needs to be manually corrected.
item.translated:
En slette operation blev startet men ikke afsluttet og forsøget på genskabe transaktionen fejlede med beskeden: {1}.
Hvis dette problem opstår mere end én gang, er det muligt at slette transaktionsfilen er defekt. Prøv at omdøbe filen "{0}" og kør operationen igen. Hvis der ikke kommer fejlbeskeder kan filen slettes, ellers vil Duplicati fortælle hvilke filer der skal rettes manuelt.

item.name: DeletingTransactionLeftoverFile
item.original: Deleting file from delete transaction "{0}"

item.name: ExistingDeleteTransactionError
item.original: An internal error has occured, a request was made to initiate a delete transaction, but one was already present
item.translated: En intern fejl opstod, der blev forsøgt at starte en slette transaktion, men der var allerede én igang.

item.name: MultipleDeleteTransactionsFoundError
item.original: There were multiple delete transaction files found. Please manually inspect the target destination and resolve this error.
item.translated: Der blev fundet mere end én slette transaktionsfil. Kontroller venligst manuelt destinationen og løs problemet.

item.name: NonExistingDeleteTransactionError
item.original: An internal error has occured, a request was made to complete a delete transaction, but there was not a transaction in progress
item.translated: En intern fejl opstod, en slettet transaktion skulle afsluttes, men ingen transaktion var igang

item.name: DefaultMessage
item.original: The user has stopped the operation

item.name: InvalidEntryTypeError
item.original: Invalid entry type:{0}

not-updated.item: An error occurred while running the backup, no files were uploaded: {0}
The operation {0} has started

item.name: BadSortingDetectedError
item.original: Bad sorting of backup times detected

item.name: BadVolumeSortOrder
item.original: Bad sort order on volumes detected

item.name: CannotCleanWithoutHashesError
item.original: When using cleanup the manifests and hashes must be verified
item.translated: Når "cleanup" funktionen køres skal manifest og hash værdier læses

item.name: DeletingBackupSetMessage
item.original: Deleting backup at {0}

item.name: DeprecatedOptionUsedWarning
item.original: The option {0} is deprecated: {1}

item.name: DuplicateOptionNameWarning
item.original: The option --{0} exists more than once, please report this to the developers
item.translated: Indstillingen --{0} findes mere end én gang, rapporter venligst dette til udviklerne

item.name: FailedToFindControlFilesMessage
item.original: Failed to find control files in: {0}
item.translated: Kunne ikke finde kontrol filer i: {0}

item.name: FileHashFailure
item.original: A hash check failed, this is an indication of a corrupt file: {0}
item.translated: Et hash check fejlede, dette er en indikation af at filen er korrupt: {0}

item.name: FilesAreNotForceDeletedMessage
item.original: Files are not deleted, use the --force command to actually remove files
item.translated: Ingen filer er slettet, angiv indstillingen --force for at fjerne filer

item.name: InternalDeleteCountError
item.original: An internal error occured, and the operation was aborted to protect the backup sets
item.translated: En intern fejl opstod og handlingen blev afsluttet for at beskytte backup data

item.name: ManifestsMustBeReadOnBackups
item.original: It is not allowed to disable manifest reading when performing a backup. Disabling manifests is only possible on restores, and it should only be used as a last resort.
item.translated: Det er ikke tilladt at deaktivere manifest læsning mens der udføres en backup. Deaktivering af manifest læsning kan kun bruges med gendannelse og bør kun anvendes som en sidste udvej.

item.name: ManifestVersionRequiresRelativeNamesWarning
item.original: One or more manifests are from version 1, which requires that filenames searched are relative
item.translated: En eller flere manifest filer er fra version 1, hvilket kræver at de filnavne der søges angives med relative stier

item.name: MissingSignatureFile
item.original: The signature file for a content volume was missing, date: {0}, volumenumber: {1}, content volume filename: {2}
item.translated: Signatur filen til et filsæt mangler, dato: {0}, filsæt nummer: {1}, filnavn for indholdsfil: {2}

item.name: NoFilesGivenError
item.original: No filenames given for find-last-file

item.name: NoSourceFoldersError
item.original: No source folders specified for backup
item.translated: Ingen mapper blev angivet som backup kilde

item.name: NotDeletingBackupSetMessage
item.original: Not deleting backup at time: {0}, because later backups depend on it
item.translated: Sletter ikke backup fra {0}, fordi senere backup data afhænger af denne

item.name: NotDeletingLastFullMessage
item.original: The backup at time {0} is not removed because it is the last full backup, use --allow-full-removal to include this backup in the delete
item.translated: Backup data fra {0} bliver ikke slettet fordi det er den sidste fulde backup, benyt --allow-full-removal for at slette denne backup

item.name: NumberOfSourceFoldersHasChangedError
item.original: The number of source folders in the latest backup is {0}, but the number of specified folders is now {1}. It is not allowed to change source folders for a backup.
item.translated: Antallet af kilde mapper i den seneste backup er {0}, men der er angivet {1} kilde mapper. Det er ikke tilladt at ændre kilde mapper for en backup

item.name: PartialUploadMessage
item.original: Failed after uploading {0} volume(s). Error message: {1}
item.translated: En fejl opstod efter upload af {0} filsæt. Fejl besked: {1}

item.name: PrimaryManifestReadErrorLogMessage
item.original: Failed to read the primary manifest {0}, attempting secondary, if available. Error message: {1}
item.translated: Fejlede under indlæsning af det primære manifest {0}, forsøger med sekundært hvis dette findes. Fejl besked: {1}

item.name: ReadingSecondaryManifestLogMessage
item.original: Secondary manifest file found: {0}, attempting read.
item.translated: Sekundært manifest fundet {0}, forsøger at læse dette

item.name: RemovingPartialFilesMessage
item.original: Removing partial file: {0}

item.name: SecondaryManifestReadErrorLogMessage
item.original: Failed to read the secondary manifest {0}. Error message: {1}
item.translated: Kunne ikke læse sekundært manifest {0}. Fejl besked: {1}

item.name: SignatureCachePathMissingError
item.original: Signature cache path was not given as an argument
item.translated: Der blev ikke angivet en mappe til signatur cache

item.name: SkippedContentVolumeLogMessage
item.original: The content volume {0} is not present in the manifest and is not used
item.translated: Filsættet {0} findes ikke i manifest filen og anvendes ikke

item.name: SkippedUnlistedSignatureFileWarning

item.name: SourceDirIsIncludedMultipleTimesError
item.original: The folder {0} is included multiple times
item.translated: Mappen {0} er inkluderet mere end én gang

item.name: SourceDirsAreRelatedError
item.original: The folder {1} is a subfolder of {0}. It is not allowed to specify the same folder multiple times.
item.translated: Mappen {1} er en undermappe af {0}. Det er ikke tilladt at inkludere den samme mappe mere end én gang.

item.name: SourceFolderIsMissingError
item.original: The source folder {0} does not exist, aborting backup
item.translated: Kilde mappen {0} findes ikke, afbryder backup

item.name: SourceFoldersHasChangedError
item.original: The folder {0} is no longer in the source folder set. It is not allowed to change source folders for a backup.
item.translated: Mappen {0} findes ikke længere i listen over kilde mapper. Det er ikke tilladt at ændre kilde mapper for en backup.

item.name: UnexpectedCompressionError
item.original: Unexpected compression mode: {0}

item.name: UnexpectedOperationTypeError
item.original: The operation mode {0} was not expected

item.name: UnsupportedBooleanValue
item.original: The value "{1}" supplied to --{0} does not parse into a valid boolean, this will be treated as if it was set to "true"
item.translated: Værdien "{1}" som blev angivet til indstillingen --{0} kan ikke omdannes til en gyldig sandhedsværdi, den behandles som om den er sat til "true"

item.name: UnsupportedEnumerationValue
item.original: The option --{0} does not support the value "{1}", supported values are: {2}
item.translated: Indstillingen --{0} understøtter ikke værdien "{1}", de understøttede værdier er: {2}

item.translated: Værdien "{1}" som blev angivet til --{0} angiver ikke et gyldigt heltal

item.original: The option --{0} is not supported because the module {1} is not currently loaded
item.translated: Indstillingen --{0} understøttes ikke fordi den relevante modul {1} ikke er indlæst

item.name: UnsupportedOptionWarning

item.translated: Indstillingen --{0} er ikke understøttet og vil blive ignoreret

item.name: UnsupportedPathValue
item.original: The value "{1}" supplied to --{0} does not represent a valid path
item.translated: Værdien "{1}" som er angivet til --{0} angiver ikke en gyldig sti

item.name: UnsupportedSizeValue
item.original: The value "{1}" supplied to --{0} does not represent a valid size
item.translated: Værdien "{1}" som er angivet til --{0} angiver ikke en gyldig størrelse

item.name: UnsupportedTimeValue
item.original: The value "{1}" supplied to --{0} does not represent a valid time
item.translated: Værdien "{1}" som er angivet til --{0} angiver ikke en gyldig tid

item.name: CannotSkipHashChecksOnBackup
item.original: Hash checks cannot be disabled while performing a backup
item.translated: Hash check kan ikke deaktiveres hvis der køres en backup

item.name: CannotVerifyChain
item.original: Unable to verfiy the backup chain when the option --dont-read-manifests is active
item.translated: Kan ikke kontrollere backup kæden når indstillingen --dont-read-manifests er aktiveret

item.name: CannotVerifyWithoutHashes
item.original: Hash checks cannot be disabled while performing a verification
item.translated: Hash check kan ikke deaktiveres hvis der køres en verifikation

item.name: DisablingSignatureCacheForVerification
item.original: The signature cache is disabled when performing verification
item.translated: Signature cachen er deaktiveret under verifikation

item.name: ManifestAndFileCountMismatchError
item.original: The manifest file {0} indicates that there should be {1} volumes, but the file list indicates {2}
item.translated: Manifest filen {0} indikerer at der skal være {1} filsæt, men fil listen indikerer {2}

item.name: ManifestsMustBeRead
item.original: Disabling manifests is only possible on restores, and it should only be used as a last resort.
item.translated: Deaktivering af manifest filer er kun muligt under gendannelse, og bør kun bruges som en sidste udvej.

item.name: PreviousManifestFilenameMismatchError
item.original: The manifest file {0} indicates that the previous manifest file should be {1} but it was {2}
item.translated: Manifest filen {0} indikerer at den forrige manifest fil skulle være {1} men den var {2}

item.name: PreviousManifestHashMismatchError
item.original: The manifest file {0} indicates that the previous manifest hash should be {1} but it was {2}
item.translated: Manifest filen {0} indikerer at hash værdien for den forrige manifest file skulle være {1} men den var {2}

item.name: FileSizeMismatchError
item.original: The file {0} has size {1} but should have size {2}
item.translated: Filen {0} har størrelsen {1} men den burde have størrelsen {2}

item.name: FilenameMismatchError
item.original: The manifest report that the file should be named {0} but it was named {1}
item.translated: Manifest filen indikerer at filen skulle hedde {0} men den hedder {1}

item.name: StatusUploadingVerificationVolume
item.original: Uploading verification file

item.name: DeleteManifestsSuggestion
item.original: If this error cannot be resolved, you can either create a new full backup or delete the offending manifests manually, followed by a cleanup command. The offending manifest files are:
item.translated: Hvis dette problem ikke kan løses, kan du enten danne en nu fuld backup eller slette de problematiske manifest filter manuelt, efterfulgt af en cleanup kommando. De problematisk manifest filer er:

item.name: FullBecauseBackendIsEmpty
item.original: A full backup is made because no existing backup chains were found on the destination
item.translated: En fuld backup udføres fordi der ikke blev fundet eksisterende backups på destinationen

item.name: FullBecauseFlagWasSet
item.original: A full backup was forced with the --{0} flag
item.translated: En fuld backup blev tvunget med --{0} flaget

item.name: FullBecauseLastFullIsFrom
item.original: A full backup is made because the latest full backup is from {0} and the full backup threshold is {1}
item.translated: En fuld backup udføres fordi den seneste fulde backup er fra {0} og der dannes en fuld backup efter {1}

item.name: FullBecauseSourceFoldersChanged
item.original: A full backup is made because the source folders have changed
item.translated: En fuld backup udføres fordi kilde mapperne er ændret

item.name: FullBecauseThereAreNIncrementals
item.original: A full backup is made because the current chain has {0} incremental backups and the full backup threshold is {1}
item.translated: En fuld backup udføres fordi den nuværende kæde har {0} trinvise backup sæt og grænsen er sat til {1}

item.name: IncrementalBecauseLastFullIsFrom
item.original: An incremental backup is made because the latest full backup is from {0} and the full backup threshold is {1}
item.translated: En trinvis backup udføres fordi den seneste fulde backup er fra {0} og der dannes en fuld backup efter {1}

item.name: IncrementalBecauseNoFlagsWereSet
item.original: An incremental backup is made because no full backup criteria was found
item.translated: En trinvis backup udføres fordi der ikke er angivet kriterier for dannelse af fuld backup

item.name: IncrementalBecauseThereAreNIncrementals
item.original: An incremental backup is made because the current chain has {0} incremental backups and the full backup threshold is {1}
item.translated: En trinvis backup udføres fordi den nuværende kæde har {0} trinvise backup sæt og grænsen er sat til {1}

item.name: EofInManifestFile
item.original: Got EOF while attempting to locate the self-hash of a manifest
item.translated: Fik EOF under et forsøg på at finde manifest filens egen hash

item.name: HashGenerationFailure
item.original: The hash generation for the manifest file resulted in the hash value {0} but should have been {1}
item.translated: Hash dannelsen for manifest filen gav hash værdien {0} men den burde være {1}

item.name: InternalError
item.original: An internal error occured when creating the manifest, please report this to the developers
item.translated: En intern fejl opstod under dannelse af manifest filen, rapport venligst dette til udviklerne

item.name: InvalidManifestError
item.original: The manifest file did not have the expected root Xml element: {0}
item.translated: Manifest filen havde ikke det forventede xml rod element: {0}

item.name: InvalidSourcePathError
item.original: The number of source paths in the manifest file are wrong
item.translated: Antallet af kilde stier i manifest filen er forkert

item.name: MainfestIsMissingSelfFilename
item.original: Manifest did not contain its own filename as expected
item.translated: Manifest filen indeholder ikke sit eget filnavn som den burde

item.name: MainfestIsMissingSelfHash
item.original: Manifest did not contain a self hash as expected
item.translated: Manifest filen indeholder ikke sin egen hash som den burde

item.name: ManifestValidationError
item.original: Failed to validate manifest: {0}

item.name: MissingPreviousManifestFilename
item.original: Manifest has no previous manifest filename

item.name: MissingPreviousManifestHash
item.original: Manifest has no previous manifest hash

item.name: NoFilesError
item.original: Invalid manifest, there were no files in the manifest
item.translated: Ugyldigt manifest, der var ingen filer i manifestet

item.name: SelfhashMismatch
item.original: Manifest file had selfhash {0} but the hash of the file is {1}
item.translated: Manifest filen har egen hash {0} men filens hash er {1}

item.name: UnsupportedHashAlgorithmError
item.original: The manifest uses the hash algorithm {0}, which is unsupported
item.translated: Manifestet anvender hash algoritmen {0}, som ikke understøttes

item.name: UnsupportedVersionError
item.original: The manifest has version {0}, the current application only supports versions up to {1}
item.translated: Manifestet har version {0}, det nuværende program understøtter kun versioner op til {1}

item.name: WrongCountError
item.original: Invalid manifest, wrong count, signature hashes: {0}, content hashes: {1}
item.translated: Ugyldigt manifest, forkert antal, signatur hash værdier: {0}, indhold hash værdier: {1}

not-updated.item: This value can be used to set a known upper limit on the amount of space a backend has. If the backend reports the size itself, this value is ignored
A reported maximum storage
Symlink handling

Using this option to handle symlinks different. The "{0}" option will simply record a symlink with its name and destination, and a restore will recreate the symlink as a link. Use the option "{1}" to ignore all symlinks and not store any information about them. Previous versions of Duplicati used the setting "{2}", which will cause symlinked files to be included and restore as normal files.
Exclude files by attribute
Use this option to exclude files with certain attributes. Use a comma separated list of attribute names to specify more that one. Possible values are: {0}

Activate this option to map VSS snapshots to a drive (similar to SUBST, using Win32 DefineDosDevice). This will create temporary drives that are then used to access the contents of a snapshot. This workaround can speed up file access on Windows XP.
Map snapshots to a drive (Windows only)

item.name: AsynchronousuploadLong
item.original: By supplying this option, Duplicati will transmit files, while building volumes. This can shorten the time it takes to perform a backup, but requires more diskspace.
item.translated: Ved at aktivere denne indstilling vil Duplicati overføre filer mens der bygges sæt. Dette kan mindske overførselstiden, men kræver mere diskplads.

item.name: AsynchronousuploadShort
item.original: Transmit files on a separate thread
item.translated: Overfør filer på en separat tråd

item.name: AutocleanupLong
item.original: If a backup is interrupted there will likely be partial files present on the backend. Using this flag, Duplicati will automatically remove such files when encountered.
item.translated: Hvis en backup bliver afbrudt er det muligt at der findes delvise filer på destinationen. Ved at anvende denne indstilling vil Duplicati automatisk fjerne sådanne filer når de opdages.

item.name: AutocleanupShort
item.original: A flag indicating that Duplicati should remove unused files
item.translated: En indstilling der indikerer at Duplicati skal fjerne ubenyttede filer

item.name: BackupprefixLong
item.original: Any string used to prefix the filenames generated by Duplicati.
item.translated: En vilkårlig tekst streng der sættes foran navnet der dannes af Duplicati.

item.name: BackupprefixShort
item.original: Backup volume filename prefix

item.name: DisablefiletimecheckLong
item.original: The operating system keeps track of the last time a file was written. Using this information, Duplicati can quickly determine if the file has been modified. If some application deliberately modifies this information, Duplicati won't work correctly unless this flag is set.
item.translated: Operativ systemet holder styre på hvornår der sidst blev skrevet til en fil. Ved at bruge denne information kan Duplicati hurtigt afgøre om en fil blev redigeret. Hvis et program bevidst ændrer i denne information, vil Duplicati ikke fungere korrekt, medmindre denne indstilling er sat.

item.name: DisablefiletimecheckShort
item.original: Disable checks based on file time

item.name: ExcludeLong
item.original: Exclude files that match this filter. The filter is a "file-globbing" filter, much like commandline options. You can use "*.txt" to exclude all text files.
item.translated: Ekskluder filer der passer til dette filter. Filteret er af typen "fil-globbing", ligesom kommandolinie parametre. Du kan bruge "*.txt" for at ekskludere alle tekst filer.

item.name: ExcluderegexpLong
item.original: Exclude files that match this filter. The filter is a regular expression filter. You can use "(.*)\.txt" to exclude all text files.
item.translated: Ekskluder filer der matcher dette filter. Filtret er et regulært udtryk. Du kan angive "(.*)\.txt" for at ekskludere alle tekst filer.

item.name: ExcluderegexpShort
item.original: Exclude files regular expression

item.name: ExcludeShort
item.original: Exclude files

item.name: FiletorestoreLong
item.original: By default, duplicati will restore all files in the backup. Use this option to restore only a subset of the files
item.translated: Som standart vil Duplicati gendanne alle filer i en backup. Brug denne indstilling til at udvælge enkelte filer der skal gendannes.

item.name: FiletorestoreShort
item.original: A list of files to restore
item.translated: En liste med filer der skal gendannes

item.name: ForceLong
item.original: When deleting old files, Duplicati will only write out what files are supposed to be deleted. Specify the "force" option to actually remove them.
item.translated: Når der slettes filer vil Duplicati kun skrive hvilke filer der skal slettes. Angiv denne indstilling for at sørge for at de også fjernes.

item.name: ForceShort
item.original: Force the removal of files

item.name: FullifolderthanLong
item.original: If the last full backup is older than the duration supplied here, Duplicati will make a full backup, otherwise an incremental
item.translated: Hvis den sidste fulde backup er ældre end det interval der er angivet til denne indstilling, vil Duplicati udføre en fuld backup, ellers udføres en trinvis

item.name: FullifolderthanShort
item.original: The max duration between full backups
item.translated: Det højeste interval mellem fulde backup'er

item.name: FullLong
item.original: When this flag is specified, Duplicati will make a full backup of all files, and ignore any incremental data.
item.translated: Når denne indstilling er aktiveret vil Duplicati udføre en fuld backup, og ignorere eksisterende trinvis data

item.name: FullShort
item.original: A flag used to force full backups
item.translated: En indstilling der gennemtvinger en fuld backup

item.name: GpgencryptionLong
item.original: By default, Duplicati will use the AES encryption algorithm to encrypt the backup volumes, setting this flag makes Duplicati use the GNU Privacy Guard instead. GnuPG must be installed on the machine for this to work.
item.translated: Som standard vil Duplicati bruge AES algoritmen til at kryptere backup data. Denne indstilling vil få Duplicati til at benytte GNU Privacy Guard istedet. GnuPG skal være installeret på maskinen for at denne kan fungere

item.name: GpgencryptionShort
item.original: Use GnuPG for encryption

item.name: IncludeLong
item.original: Include files that match this filter. The filter is a "file-globbing" filter, much like commandline options. You can use "*.txt" to include all text files.
item.translated: Inkluder filer der passer til dette filter. Filteret er af typen "fil-globbing", ligesom kommandolinie parametre. Du kan bruge "*.txt" for at inkludere alle tekst filer.

item.name: IncluderegexpLong
item.original: Include files that match this filter. The filter is a regular expression filter. You can use "(.*)\.txt" to include all text files.
item.translated: Inkluder filer der matcher dette filter. Filtret er et regulært udtryk. Du kan angive "(.*)\.txt" for at inkludere alle tekst filer.

item.name: IncluderegexpShort
item.original: Include files regular expression

item.name: IncludeShort
item.original: Include files

item.name: AllowsleepShort
item.original: Allow system to enter sleep power modes for inactivity during backup/restore operations (Windows only)
item.translated: Tillad systemet at gå i strømspare tilstand mens en backup er igang (kun til Windows)

item.name: MaxdownloadprsecondLong
item.original: By setting this value you can limit how much bandwidth Duplicati consumes for downloads. Setting this limit can make the backups take longer, but will make Duplicati less intrusive.
item.translated: Ved at sætte denne indstilling kan du begrænse hvor meget båndbredde Duplicati bruger under download. Hvis denne indstilling er sat kan backup proceduren tage længere tid, men Duplicati vil være mindre belastende for systemet.

item.name: MaxdownloadprsecondShort
item.original: Max number of bytes to download pr. second
item.translated: Maksimalt antal bytes downloaded pr. sekund

item.name: MaxuploadprsecondLong
item.original: By setting this value you can limit how much bandwidth Duplicati consumes for uploads. Setting this limit can make the backups take longer, but will make Duplicati less intrusive.
item.translated: Ved at sætte denne indstilling kan du begrænse hvor meget båndbredde Duplicati bruger under upload. Hvis denne indstilling er sat kan backup proceduren tage længere tid, men Duplicati vil være mindre belastende for systemet.

item.name: MaxuploadprsecondShort
item.original: Max number of bytes to upload pr. second
item.translated: Maksimalt antal bytes uploaded pr. sekund

item.name: NoencryptionLong
item.original: If you store the backups on a local disk, and prefer that they are kept unencrypted, you can turn of encryption completely by using this switch.
item.translated: Hvis du gemmer backup data på en lokal disk, og foretrækker at filerne er gemt uden kryptering kan du deaktivere kryptering med denne indstilling.

item.name: NoencryptionShort
item.original: Disable encryption

item.name: NumberofretriesLong
item.original: If an upload or download fails, Duplicati will retry a number of times before failing. Use this to handle unstable network connections better.
item.translated: Hvis en upload eller download fejler vil Duplicati forsøge igen antal gange før der gives op. Dette bevirker at ustabile netværksforbindelser håndteres bedre.

item.name: NumberofretriesShort
item.original: Number of times to retry a failed transmission

item.name: PassphraseLong
item.original: Supply a passphrase that Duplicati will use to encrypt the backup volumes, making them unreadable without the passphrase. This variable can also be supplied through the environment variable PASSPHRASE.
item.translated: Angiv et kodeord som Duplicati vil benytte til at kryptere backup data, for at gøre dem ulæselige uden koden. Denne indstilling kan også angives som miljøvariablen PASSPHRASE.

item.name: PassphraseShort
item.original: Passphrase used to encrypt backups
item.translated: Kode anvendt til at kryptere backup data

item.name: RestoretimeLong
item.original: By default, Duplicati will restore files from the most recent backup, use this option to select another item. You may use relative times, like "-2M" for a backup from two months ago.
item.translated: Som standard vil Duplicati gendanne filer fra den nyeste backup. Brug denne indstilling til at vælge en anden backup. Du kan anvende relative tider, f.eks. "-2M" for at gendanne fra en backup der er 2 måneder gammel.

item.name: RestoretimeShort
item.original: The time to restore files

item.name: RetrydelayLong
item.original: After a failed transmission, Duplicati will wait a short period before attempting again. This is usefull if the network drops out occasionally during transmissions.
item.translated: Efter en fejlet transmission vil Duplicati vente i en kort periode før der forsøges igen. Dette er brugbart hvis netværket af og til forsvinder under transmissioner.

item.name: RetrydelayShort
item.original: Time to wait between retries
item.translated: Tid der ventes mellem gentagne forsøg

item.name: ShortfilenamesLong
item.original: If the filesystem does not support the long filenames that Duplicati uses, this switch will change the time to be a much more compact, but hard to read format. It will also make the default prefix "dpl".
item.translated: Hvis filsystemet ikke understøtter de lange filnavne som Duplicati anvender, kan denne indstilling anvendes for at skifte til et mere kompakt med format. Dette vil også skifte standard præfix til "dpl".

item.name: ShortfilenamesShort
item.original: Use short filenames

item.name: SignaturecachepathLong
item.original: If this path is supplied, Duplicati will store all signature files here, so re-downloads can be avoided.
item.translated: Hvis denne sti er angivet vil Duplicati gemme en kopi af alle signatur filer her, så gen-downloads kan forhindres.

item.name: SignaturecachepathShort
item.original: A path to temporary storage
item.translated: Sti til en mappe med signatur filer

item.name: SignaturecontrolfilesLong
item.original: Supply a list of files separated with semicolons, that will be added to each backup. The Duplicati GUI program uses this to store the setup database with each backup.
item.translated: Angiv filer der skal tilføjes til hver backup, adskilt med semikolon. Duplicati GUI programmet anvender denne indstilling til at gemme indstillingsdatabasen i en backup.

item.name: SignaturecontrolfilesShort
item.original: A list of control files to embed in the backups
item.translated: En liste med kontrolfiler der indlejres i en backup

item.name: SkipfilehashchecksLong
item.original: If the hash for the volume does not match, Duplicati will refuse to use the backup. Supply this flag to allow Duplicati to proceed anyway.
item.translated: Hvis hash værdien for et backup sæt ikke passer, vil Duplicati nægte at anvende backup data. Brug denne indstilling for at tillade at Duplicati fortsætter alligevel.

item.name: SkipfilehashchecksShort
item.original: Set this flag to skip hash checks
item.translated: Angiv denne indstilling for at deaktivere hash kontrol

item.name: SkipfileslargerthanLong
item.original: This option allows you to exclude files that are larger than the given value. Use this to prevent backups becoming extremely large.
item.translated: Denne indstilling muliggør ekskludering af filer der er større end den givne værdi. Benyt dette til at forhindre at backup sæt bliver ekstremt store.

item.name: SkipfileslargerthanShort
item.original: A size string that limits the size of files being backed up
item.translated: En grænse for filstørrelse for filer der tages backup af

item.name: TempdirLong
item.original: Duplicati will use the system default temporary folder. This option can be used to supply an alternative folder for temporary storage.
item.translated: Duplicati vil anvende systemets standard mappe for midlertidige filer. Denne indstilling kan anvendes til at angive en anden midlertidig mappe.

item.name: TempdirShort
item.original: Temporary storage folder

item.name: ThreadpriorityLong
item.original: Selects another thread priority for the process. Use this to set Duplicati to be more or less CPU intensive.
item.translated: Angiver en anden tråd prioritet for processen. Benyt dette for at lade Duplicati være mere eller mindre CPU intensiv.

item.name: ThreadpriorityShort
item.original: Thread priority

item.name: TimeseparatorLong
item.original: Per default, Duplicati will use the colon ":" character to separate the time fields in the filename. However, on some filesystem, notably windows, this character is not allowed. Use this option to use another character.
item.translated: Som standard vil Duplicati bruge kolon (":") tegnet for at adskille tidsfelter i filnavnet. På nogle systemer, særligt Windows, er dette tegn ikke tilladt. Brug denne indstilling til for at tillade et andet tegn.

item.name: TimeseparatorShort
item.original: Backup volume filename timeseparator

item.name: TotalsizeLong
item.original: This option can place an upper limit on the total size of each backup. Note that if this flag is specified the backup may not contain all files, even for a full backup.
item.translated: Denne indstilling begrænser den totale størrelse af en backup. Bemærk at hvis denne indstilling kan bevirke at en backup ikke indeholder alle filer, selv hvis der udføres en fuld backup.

item.name: TotalsizeShort
item.original: The number of bytes generated by each backup run
item.translated: Antal bytes dannet i en backup

item.name: VolsizeLong
item.original: This option can change the default volume size. Changing the size can be usefull if the backend has a limit on the size of each individual file
item.translated: Denne indstilling kan skifte størrelsen på backup filer. Hvis destinationen har en begrænsning på størrelsen af en enkelt fil, kan denne indstilling tilpasses så denne grænse overholdes.

item.name: VolsizeShort
item.original: A size string that limits the size of the volumes

item.name: DisableStreamingLong
item.original: Enabling this option will disallow usage of the streaming interface, which means that transfer progress bars will not show, and bandwidth throttle settings will be ignored.
item.translated: Hvis denne indstilling aktiveres vil det ikke tillades at "stream" interfacet anvendes, hvilket betyder at overførsler ikke vil vise transmissionsstatus og at båndbredde begrænsninger ignoreres.

item.name: DisableStreamingShort
item.original: Disables use of the streaming transfer method

item.name: AllowfullremoveLong
item.original: As a precaution, the last full backup will never be removed, even if using the "delete-all-but-n-full 0" command. Set this option to allow removing the last backup.
item.translated: For at sikre data vil den sidste fulde backup aldrig blive slettet, selv hvis der angives "delete-all-but-n-full 0". Aktiver denne indstilling for at tillade at den sidste backup fjernes.

item.name: AllowfullremoveShort
item.original: Allow removal of the all backups
item.translated: Tillader fjernelse af alle backup data

item.name: DontreadmanifestsLong
item.original: This option will make sure the contents of the manifest file are not read. This also implies that file hashes are not checked either. Use only for disaster recovery.
item.translated: Denne indstilling bevirker at indholdet af manifest filer ikke er læst. Dette betyder at hash værdier heller ikke kontrolleres. Benyt kun denne indstilling til katastrofe gendannelse.

item.name: DontreadmanifestsShort
item.original: An option that prevents verifying the manifests
item.translated: En indstilling der deaktiverer manifest kontrol

item.name: AllowsourcefolderchangeLong
item.original: This option can be used to disable the check for the same source folders. It is used in unittests, and is NOT intended for everyday use. Do not use this option unless you know what you are doing.
item.translated: Denne indstilling kan deaktivere kontrol af om der anvendes samme kilde mapper. Denne indstilling anvendes til automatiserede tests og er IKKE beregnet til daglig brug. Aktiver ikke denne indstilling, medmindre du ved hvad du gør.

item.name: AllowsourcefolderchangeShort
item.original: Skip verifying the source folders

item.name: FullifsourcefolderchangedLong
item.original: It is not allowed to change the sourcefolder or the number of source folders. If this option is enabled, the backup will become a full backup if the source folders have changed, which will then start a new chain of backups with the new folder set. If --allow-sourcefolder-change is also set, a full backup is only issued if the number of of source folders have changed
item.translated: Det er ikke tilladt at skifte kildemapper eller antallet af kildemapper. Hvis denne indstilling er aktiveret og kildemapperne er ændrede, vil backup'en blive til en fuld backup med de nye mapper. Hvis --allow-sourcefolder-change er sat vil en fuld backup kun blive udført hvis antallet af kildemapper er ændret

item.name: FullifsourcefolderchangedShort
item.original: Run a full backup if the sourcefolder has changed
item.translated: Kør en fuld backup hvis kildemapperne er ændrede

item.name: CompressionmoduleLong
item.original: Duplicati supports plugable compression modules. Use this option to select a module to use for compression. This is only applied when creating new volumes, when reading an existing file, the filename is used to select the compression module.
item.translated: Duplicati understøtter dynamiske kompressionsmoduler. Brug denne indstilling til angive hvilket modul der skal anvendes til at komprimere data. Dette anvendes kun ved oprettelse af nye datasæt. Ved læsning af eksisterede filer benyttes filnavnet til at vælge kompressionsmodul.

item.name: CompressionmoduleShort
item.original: Select what module to use for compression

item.name: EncryptionmoduleLong
item.original: Duplicati supports plugable encryption modules. Use this option to select a module to use for encryption. This is only applied when creating new volumes, when reading an existing file, the filename is used to select the encryption module.
item.translated: Duplicati understøtter dynamiske krypteringsmoduler. Brug denne indstilling til angive hvilket modul der skal anvendes til at kryptere data. Dette anvendes kun ved oprettelse af nye datasæt. Ved læsning af eksisterede filer benyttes filnavnet til at vælge krypterinsmodul.

item.name: EncryptionmoduleShort
item.original: Select what module to use for encryption

item.name: GpgencryptionDeprecated
item.original: Use --encryption-module=gpg instead

item.name: DisablemoduleLong
item.original: Supply one or more module names, separated by commas to unload them
item.translated: Angiv et eller modulnavne, adskilt med komma, for at deaktivere dem

item.name: DisablemoduleShort
item.original: Disabled one or more modules

item.name: EnablemoduleLong
item.original: Supply one or more module names, separated by commas to load them
item.translated: Angiv et eller modulnavne, adskilt med komma, for at aktivere dem

item.name: EnablemoduleShort
item.original: Enables one or more modules

item.name: SnapshotpolicyLong
item.original: This settings controls the usage of snapshots, which allows Duplicati to backup files that are locked by other programs. If this is set to "off", Duplicati will not attempt to create a disk snapshot. Setting this to "auto" makes Duplicati attempt to create a snapshot, and fail silently if that was not allowed or supported. A setting of "on" will also make Duplicati attempt to create a snapshot, but will produce a warning message in the log if it fails. Setting it to "required" will make Duplicati abort the backup if the snapshot creation fails. On windows this uses the Volume Shadow Copy Services (VSS) and requires administrative privileges. On linux this uses Logical Volume Management (LVM) and requires root privileges.
item.translated: Denne indstilling kontrollerer brugen af snapshot, hvilket gør det muligt for Duplicati at tage backup af filer der er låst af andre programmer. Hvis denne sættes til "off" vil Duplicati ikke forsøge at oprette et snapshot. Indstillingen "auto" vil få Duplicati til at forsøge at oprette et snapshot, uden at vise en fejlbesked hvis det ikke lykkes. Hvis denne indstilling sættes til "on" vil Duplicati også forsøge at oprette et snapsnot, men skriver en fejlbesked hvis det ikke lykkes. Hvis denne indstilling sættes til "required" vil Duplicati standse backup'en hvis det ikke lykkes at oprette et snapshot. På Windows bruges der Shadow Copy Services (VSS) hvilket kræver Administrator rettigheder. På Linux anvendes der Logical Volume Management (LVM) og dette kræver root rettigheder.

item.name: SnapshotpolicyShort
item.original: Controls the use of disk snapshots

item.name: AsynchronousuploadfolderLong
item.original: The pre-generated volumes will be placed into the temporary folder by default, this option can set a different folder for placing the temporary volumes, despite the name, this also works for synchronous runs
item.translated: De præ-gerenerede backup sæt placeres i den midlertidige mappe som standard. Denne indstilling kan angives for at anvende en anden mappe hvori backup sæt gemmes. På trods af navnet virker denne indstilling også for synkrone kørsler.

item.name: AsynchronousuploadfolderShort
item.original: The path where ready volumes are placed until uploaded
item.translated: Stien hvor backup sæt placeres indtil de er uploadet

item.name: AsynchronousuploadlimitLong
item.original: When performing asynchronous uploads, Duplicati will create volumes that can be uploaded. To prevent Duplicati from generating too many volumes, this option limits the number of pending uploads. Set to zero to disable the limit
item.translated: Når der dannes asynkrone upload vil Duplicati danne backup sæt der kan uploades. For at forhindre Duplicati i at danne for mange sæt, kan denne indstilling angives for at begrænse antallet af udestående uploads. Sæt denne til nul for at fjerne begrænsningen.

item.name: AsynchronousuploadlimitShort
item.original: The number of volumes to create ahead of time
item.translated: Antallet af backup sæt der dannes forud

item.name: DebugoutputLong
item.original: Activating this option will make some error messages more verbose, which may help you track down a particular issue
item.translated: Ved at aktivere denne indstilling vil nogle fejlbeskeder indeholde flere oplysninger, som kan hjælpe dig med at fejlfinde.

item.name: DebugoutputShort
item.original: Enables debugging output

item.name: ExcludeemptyfoldersLong
item.original: By setting this option to true, a folder which has no files that match the filter will be excluded from the backup
item.translated: Ved at aktivere denne indstilling vil en mappe der ikke indeholder inkluderede filer blive udeladt

item.name: ExcludeemptyfoldersShort
item.original: Controls empty folder actions

item.name: OldfilenamesDeprecated
item.original: This option will be removed in the future but is included for the odd case where the new format breaks something
item.translated: Denne indstilling bliver fjernet på et tidspunkt, men er inkluderet i tilfælde af at den er krævet for at løse et problem

item.name: OldfilenamesLong
item.original: By setting this option the filenames generated by Duplicati will contain a time separator as well as a timezone component, which is not cross platform compatible
item.translated: Ved at aktivere denne indstilling vil filnavne der dannes af Duplicati indeholde en tidsseparator og en tidszone, hvilket ikke er kompatibelt med alle platforme

item.name: OldfilenamesShort
item.original: Uses the old filename format
item.translated: Benyt det gamle format til filnavne

item.name: ShortfilenamesDeprecated
item.original: Duplicati now uses a filename format that is portable across all operating systems, so this option should not be used and will be removed in the future
item.translated: Duplicati benytter nu et format til filnavne der virker på tværs af alle platforme, så denne indstilling bør ikke anvendes og vil blive fjernet på et tidspunkt

item.name: TimeseparatorDeprecated
item.original: Duplicati no longer uses a time separator for the filenames so this option is useless
item.translated: Duplicati benytter ikke længere en tidsseparator i filnavne, så denne indstilling er ubrugelig

item.name: LogfileLong
item.original: Specifies the name of a while into which internal log information is written
item.translated: Angiver navnet på en fil hvori der skrives intern lognings information

item.name: LogfileShort
item.original: Log internal information

item.name: LoglevelLong
item.original: Specifies the amount of log information to write into the file specified by --log-file
item.translated: Angiver mængden af data der skrives til filen den angives af --log-file

item.name: LoglevelShort
item.original: Log information level

item.name: DisableautocreatefolderLong
item.original: If Duplicati detects that the target folder is missing, it will create it automatically. Activate this option to prevent automatic folder creation.
item.translated: Hvis Duplicati opdager at destinationsmappen mangler bliver den automatisk oprettet. Aktiver denne indstilling for at forhindre automatisk mappe oprettelse

item.name: DisableautocreatefolderShort
item.original: Disables automatic folder creation

item.name: VssexcludewritersLong
item.original: Use this option to exclude faulty writers from a snapshot. This is equivalent to the -wx flag of the vshadow.exe tool, except that it only accepts writer class GUIDs, and not component names or instance GUIDs. Multiple GUIDs must be separated with a semicolon, and most forms of GUIDs are allowed, including with and without curly braces.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at ekskludere defekte skrivere fra et snapshot. Dette fungerer på samme måde som -wx indstillingen i værktøjet vshadow.exe, men der accepteres kun skriverens klasse GUID værdier og ikke komponent navne eller instans GUID værdier. Flere GUID værdier kan angives med et semikolon, og de fleste formater accepteres, både med og uden krølleparenteser

item.name: VssexcludewritersShort
item.original: A semicolon separated list of guids of VSS writers to exclude (Windows only)
item.translated: En liste med GUID værdier for VSS skrivere der skal ekskluderes (kun til Windows)

item.name: UsnpolicyLong
item.original: This settings controls the usage of NTFS USN numbers, which allows Duplicati to obtain a list of files and folders much faster. If this is set to "off", Duplicati will not attempt to use USN. Setting this to "auto" makes Duplicati attempt to use USN, and fail silently if that was not allowed or supported. A setting of "on" will also make Duplicati attempt to use USN, but will produce a warning message in the log if it fails. Setting it to "required" will make Duplicati abort the backup if the USN usage fails. This feature is only supported on Windows and requires administrative privileges.
item.translated: Denne indstilling kontrollerer brugen af NTFS USN værdier, hvilket gør det muligt for Duplicati at danne en list med filer og mapper meget hurtigere. Hvis denne indstilling er sat til "off" vil Duplicati ikke forsøge at bruge USN. Hvis denne er sat til "auto" vil Duplicati forsøge at bruge USN hvis det er muligt, men ignorere eventuelle fejl. Hvis der angives "on" vil Duplicati ligeledes forsøge at anvende USN og fortsætte ved en fejl, men vil skrive en fejlbesked. Hvis denne indstiling sættes til "required" vil Duplicati afbryde backup'en hvis der ikke kan aktiveres USN. Denne indstilling understøttes kun på Windows og kræver Administrator rettigheder.

item.name: UsnpolicyShort
item.original: Controls the use of NTFS Update Sequence Numbers
item.translated: Angiv brug af NTFS Update Sequence Numbers

item.name: DisableusndiffcheckLong
item.original: If USN is enabled the USN numbers are used to find all changed files since last backup. Use this option to disable the use of USN numbers, which will make Duplicati investigate all source files. This option is primarily intended for testing and should not be disabled in a production environment. If USN is not enabled, this option has no effect.
item.translated: Hvis USN er aktiveret vil USN værdierne bruges til at finde alle ændringer siden sidste backup. Brug denne indstilling for at deaktivere brugen af USN værdier, hvilket vil får Duplicati til at undersøge alle kildefiler. Denne indstilling er primært tiltænkt brug i forbindelse med test og bør ikke anvendes i produktion. Hvis USN ikke er aktiveret, har denne indstilling ingen effekt.

item.name: DisableusndiffcheckShort
item.original: Disables changelist by USN numbers

item.name: OpenfilepolicyLong
item.original: If Duplicati encounters a file that is opened by another program, it will attempt to read whatever contents that are in the file. Since the file may be written during the backup, this can cause the backup to contain a partially written file. Use this option to disable this, omitting locked files from the backup. This option has no effect if a snapshot is active.
item.translated: Hvis Duplicati forsøger at læse en fil der er åben i et andet program, vil Duplicati som standard forsøge at læse data fra denne fil. Eftersom det er muligt at filen bliver overskrevet mens den bliver læst, kan backup'en indeholde en delvis fil. Benyt denne indstilling for at deaktivere dette, hvilket vil udelade ændrede filer fra backup'en. Hvis der anvendes et snapshot har denne indstilling ingen effekt.

item.name: OpenfilepolicyShort
item.original: Determines how to handle open files

item.name: DisabletimetoleranceLong
item.original: When deciding if a full backup should be made or an old backup should be deleted, Duplicati will adjust the times by a small fraction to ensure that minor time differences do not interfer with expected operation. If the backup is set to produce a full backup each day, and a full backup is made at, say 12:00:01, and the backup is executed again at 12:00:00, a full day has not passed and thus an incremental backup is performed. To avoid this, Duplicati inserts a 1% tolerance (max 1 hour). Use this option to disable the tolerance, and use strict time checking
item.translated: Når det afgøres om der skal dannes en fuld backup, eller om en gammel backup skal slettes, vil Duplicati justere tidspunkterne en smule, for at sikre at mindre afvigelser i tiderne ikke bevirker uventet opførsel. Hvis der dannes en fuld backup hver dag og denne kører f.eks. kl. 12:00:01 og igen kl. 12:00:00, er der ikke gået en hel dag, og der dannes derfor en trinvis backup. For at forhindre dette indsættes der en 1% tolerance (maks. 1 time). Benyt denne indstiling for at deaktivere tolerance og derved benytte præcis tidskontrol.

item.name: DisabletimetoleranceShort
item.original: Deactivates tolerance when comparing times

item.name: SortedfilelistLong
item.original: The list of files to back up is normally processed in a random fashion to ensure that all files have an equal probability of being processed. Use this setting to process the files in alphabetical order instead
item.translated: Listen med filer der skal tages backup af læses normalt i en tilfældig rækkefølge for at sikre at alle filer har lige stor sandsynlighed for at blive undersøgt. Aktiver denne indstilling for at benytte en alfabestisk rækkefølge istedet.

item.name: SortedfilelistShort
item.original: Sort the list of files

item.name: CreateverificationfileLong
item.original: If the backup is encrypted, the remote backend cannot verify the backup contents without the password. If this option is activated, Duplicati stores an unencrypted file on the backend. The file is never read by Duplicati, but allows the remote server to verify the backup integrity without requiring a password. The file contains no sensitive information, only a list of files that are expected to exist on the backend and their respective hashes. This option only has an effect when creating a backup and when verifying a backup set.
item.translated: Hvis en backup er krypteret kan backup integriteten ikke kontrolleres på serveren uden kodeordet. Hvis denne indstilling er aktiveret vil Duplicati gemme en ukrypteret fil på serveren. Filen læses aldrig af Duplicati men tillader at serveren kan kontrollere backup integriteten uden et kodeord. Filen indeholder ingen følsom information, kun en liste over filer der bør findes på serveren og deres respektive hash værdier. Denne indstilling har kun en effekt under dannelse af backup og ved verifikation af en backup.

item.name: CreateverificationfileShort
item.original: Create verification file on server

item.name: VerificationLevelLong
item.original: Use this option to change the level of verifiation done by the verify command. The setting "manifest" will only verify the manifest chain. The settings "signature" will also download and verify all signature files. The setting "full", will download all files, including content files, and verify that they are unchanged.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at angive hvor meget verifikation der skal udføres når der køres en "verify" kommando. Værdien "manifest" vil kun kontrollere at manifest filerne i kæden er i orden. Værdien "signature" vil også downloade og kontrollere alle signatur filer. Hvis værdien "full" angives, downloades alle filer, inklusiv signatur og indholdsfiler, og all kontrolleres for ændringer.

item.name: VerificationLevelShort
item.original: Level of verification

item.name: ListverifyuploadsLong
item.original: Some protocols, like FTP, and some servers have problems detecting an interrupted transfer and will assume that the transfer completed, even if it did not. If this option is enabled Duplicati will list the contents of the backend after each upload and verify that the file exists and has the expected size.
item.translated: Nogle protokoller, såsom FTP, og nogle servere har problemer med at opdage en afbrudt overførsel, og vil antage at overførslen blev afsluttet, selvom dette ikke er tilfældet. Hvis denne indstilling er aktiveret vil Duplicati hente en liste med alle filer efter hver upload og kontrollere at filen eksisterer og har den forventede størrelse.

item.name: ListverifyuploadsShort
item.original: Verify uploads by listing contents
item.translated: Kontroller uploads ved at liste indhold

item.name: FullifmorethannincrementalsLong
item.original: Use this option to limit the length of the backup chain to a certain number. The number supplied here indicates the maximum number of incrementals a chain can contain (not counting the root full backup)
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at begrænse længden af bakup kæden til et bestemt antal. Nummeret der angives her angiver det totale antal trinvise backup sæt (uden at tælle den fulde backup med)

item.name: FullifmorethannincrementalsShort
item.original: The max number of incrementals in a chain

item.name: AsynchronousuploadDeprecated
item.original: Asynchronous upload is now default, you can turn it off by using the flag --{0}
item.translated: Asynkron upload er nu standard, du kan slå det fra med indstillingen --{0}

item.name: SynchronousuploadLong
item.original: Duplicati will upload files while scanning the disk and producing volumes, which usually makes the backup faster. Use this flag to turn the behavior off, so that Duplicati will wait for each volume to complete.
item.translated: Duplicati vil uploade filer mens disken scannes og der dannes backup data, hvilket normalt får backup'en til at køre hurtigere. Brug denne indstilling til at slå dette fra, så Duplicati vil vente til hver fil er uploaded.

item.name: SynchronousuploadShort
item.original: Upload files synchronously

item.name: NoconnectionreuseLong
item.original: Duplicati will attempt to perform multiple operations on a single connection, as this avoids repeated login attempts, and thus speeds up the process. This option can be used to ensure that each operation is performed on a seperate connection
item.translated: Duplicati vil forsøge at udføre flere operationer over den samme forbindelse, fordi dette bevirker at der udføres færre login forsøg og dermed kører hurtigere. Denne indstilling kan bruges til at sikre at hver operation udføres på en seperat forbindelse

item.name: NoconnectionreuseShort
item.original: Do not re-use connections

item.name: DebugretryerrorsLong
item.original: When an error occurs, Duplicati will silently retry, and only report the number of retries. Enable this option to have the error messages displayed when a retry is performed.
item.translated: Når en fejl opstår vil Duplicati forsøge igen uden at rapportere det, men kun fortælle det samlede antal forsøg. Aktiver denne indstilling for at få vist fejlbeskeden for alle fejlede forsøg.

item.name: DebugretryerrorsShort
item.original: Show error messages when a retry is performed
item.translated: Vis fejlbesked hvis en operation gentages

item.name: UploadUnchangedBackupsLong
item.original: If no files have changed, Duplicati will not upload a backup set. If the backup data is used to verify that a backup was executed, this option will make Duplicati upload a backupset even if it is empty
item.translated: Hvis ingen filer er ændret vil Duplicati ikke uploade et backup sæt. Hvis backupdata kontrolleres for at kontrollere at en backup blev udført kan denne indstilling aktiveres for at få Duplicati til at uploade et tomt backup sæt.

item.name: UploadUnchangedBackupsShort
item.original: Upload empty backup files

item.name: BackendlogdatabaseShort
item.original: Database log of remote operations

item.name: BackendlogdatabaseLong
item.original: Use this option to specify a path to a file that will store information about backend operations. This option can be used to track down errors by comparing the backend state with the expected backend state.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at angive stien til en fil der gemmer oplysninger om operationer udført på destinationen. Denne indstilling kan bruges til at finde fejl ved at sammenligne indholdet af destinationen med det forventede indhold.
