item.name: UseEmptyPathWarning
item.original: You have not entered a path to the GPG application. This will use the default path to the GPG application. The GPG application could not be found during system probing. Are you sure this is what you want?
item.translated: Du har ikke indtastet en sti til GPG programmet. Dette vil anvende standard stien til GPG programmet. Der blev ikke fundet et GPG program under system undersøgelsen. Er du sikker på at dette er som du ønsker?

item.name: Description
item.original: The GPG encryption module uses the GNU Privacy Guard program to encrypt and decrypt files. It requires that the gpg executable is available on the system. On Windows it is assumed that this is in the default installation folder under program files, under Linux and OSX it is assumed that the program is available via the PATH environment variable. It is possible to supply the path to GPG using the --gpg-program-path switch.
item.translated: GPG krypteringsmodulet bruger GNU Privacy Guard programmet til at kryptere og dekryptere filer. Det kræves at gpg programmet er tilgængeligt på systemet. Under Windows antages at dette program er installeret i standard mappen under "Programmer". Under Linux og OSX antages det at det er tilgængeligt via PATH miljøvariablen. Det er muligt at angive stien til GPG via indstillingen --gpp-program-path.

item.name: DisplayName
item.original: GNU Privacy Guard, external

item.name: GpgencryptiondecryptionswitchesLong
item.original: Use this switch to specify any extra options to GPG. You cannot specify the --passphrase-fd option here. The --decrypt option is always specified.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at angive ekstra GPG indstillinger. Du kan ikke angive --passphrase-fd indstillingen. Indstillingen --decrypt bliver altid tilføjet.

item.name: GpgencryptiondecryptionswitchesShort
item.original: Extra GPG commandline options for decryption
item.translated: Ekstra GPG kommandolinie indstillinger til dekryptering

item.name: GpgencryptiondisablearmorLong
item.original: The GPG encryption/decryption will use the --armor option for GPG to protect the files with armor. Specify this switch to remove the --armor option.
item.translated: GPG kryptering/dekryptering vil anvende --armor indstillingen for GPG for at beskytte filerne. Angiv denne indstilling for at fjerne --armor indstillingen.

item.name: GpgencryptiondisablearmorShort
item.original: Don't use GPG Armor

item.name: GpgencryptionencryptionswitchesLong
item.original: Use this switch to specify any extra options to GPG. You cannot specify the --passphrase-fd option here. The --encrypt option is always specified.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at angive ekstra GPG indstillinger. Du kan ikke angive --passphrase-fd indstillingen. Indstillingen --encrypt bliver altid tilføjet.

item.name: GpgencryptionencryptionswitchesShort
item.original: Extra GPG commandline options for encryption
item.translated: Ekstra GPG kommandolinie indstillinger til kryptering

item.name: GpgprogrampathLong
item.original: The path to the GNU Privacy Guard program. If not supplied, Duplicati will assume that the program "gpg" is available in the system path.
item.translated: Stien til GNU Privacy Guard programmet. Hvis denne ikke angives vil Duplicati antage at programmet "gpg" er tilgængelig igennem systemets PATH miljøvariabel.

item.name: GpgprogrampathShort
item.original: The path to GnuPG

item.name: SignkeyLong
item.original: The GNU Privacy Guard can optionally sign volumes with a special key. This feature is not currently active in Duplicati.
item.translated: GNU Privacy Guard kan også signere data med en speciel nøgle. Denne funktion er ikke aktiv i Duplicati.

item.name: SignkeyShort
item.original: Sign key for GnuPG

item.name: GPGNotFoundWarning

item.translated: Duplicati kunne ikke verificere eksistensen af GNU Privacy Guard. GPG virker måske alligevel, hvis den findes i systemets søgesti. Hvis krypteringen fejler bliver der ikke taget backup. Vil du fortsætte alligevel?

item.name: GpgencryptionenablearmorLong

item.translated: Brug denne indstilling til at give --armor indstillingen til GPG. Filerne bliver større, men kan sendes some almindelige tekstfiler.

item.name: GpgencryptionenablearmorShort
item.original: Use GPG Armor

item.name: Description
item.original: This module will ask the user for a encryption password on the commandline unless encryption is disabled or the password is supplied by other means
item.translated: Dette modul vil spørge brugeren om kodeordet via konsollen, medmindre kryptering er deaktiveret eller kodeordet er givet på anden vis

item.name: Displayname
item.original: Password prompt

item.name: EmptyPassphraseError
item.original: Empty passphrases are not allowed
item.translated: Et tomt kodeord er ikke tilladt

item.name: EnterPassphrasePrompt
item.original: Enter passphrase

item.name: PassphraseMismatchError
item.original: The passphrases do not match
item.translated: De indtastede kodeord er ikke ens

item.name: Description
item.original: This module exposes a number of properties that can be used to change the way http requests are issued
item.translated: Dette module giver adgang til et antal indstillinger der kan bruges til at ændre den måde hvorpå http forespørgsler sendes

item.name: DescriptionAcceptAnyCertificateLong
item.original: Use this option to accept any server certificate, regardless of what errors it may have. Please use --accept-specified-ssl-hash instead, whenever possible.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling for at acceptere alle server certifikater, uanset hvilke fejl de har. Benyt venligst –accept-specified-ssl istedet hvis det er muligt.

item.name: DescriptionAcceptAnyCertificateShort
item.original: Accept any server certificate

item.name: DescriptionAcceptHashLong
item.original: If your server certificate is reported as invalid (eg. with self-signed certificates), you can supply the certificate hash to approve it anyway. The hash value must be entered in hex format without spaces.
item.translated: Hvis dit server certifikat bliver angivet som ugyldigt (f.eks. med selvudstedte certifikater), kan du angive certifikat hash værdien for at godkende det alligevel. Hash værdien skal angives i hexadecimalt format uden mellemrum

item.name: DescriptionAcceptHashShort
item.original: Optionally accept a known SSL certificate

item.name: DisableExpect100Long
item.original: The default HTTP request has the header "Expect: 100-Continue" attached, which allows some optimizations when authenticating, but also breaks some web servers, causing them to report "417 - Expectation failed"
item.translated: Standard HTTP forespørgsler har headeren "Expect: 100-Continue" tilknyttet, hvilket muliggør nogle optimeringer i forbindelse med authentifikation, men får også nogle web servere til at fejle med beskeden: "417 - Expectation failed"

item.name: DisableExpect100Short
item.original: Disable the expect header

item.name: DisableNagleLong
item.original: By default the http requests use the RFC 896 nagling algorithm to support transfer of small packages more effeciently.
item.translated: Som standard anveder http foresprøgsler RFC 896 nagling algoritmen for at udføre overførsel af små pakker mere effektivt

item.name: DisableNagleShort
item.original: Disable nagling

item.name: DisplayName
item.original: Configure http requests

item.name: label6.Text
item.original: Note: Some FTP servers have trouble dealing with more than 2000 files. For this reason, you are advised to select a large volume size so the number of files is low.
item.translated: NB: Nogle FTP servere har problemer med at håndtere mere end 2000 filer. For at undgå problemer anbefales det at du sætter størrelsen for hver volume høj, således at antallet af filer reduceres.

item.name: Description
item.original: This backend can read and write data to an FTP based backend. Allowed formats are "ftp://hostname/folder" or "ftp://username:password@hostname/folder"
item.translated: Denne backend kan læse og skrive data til en FTP baseret vært. Tilladte formater er "ftp://hostname/folder" eller "ftp://username:password@hostname/folder"

item.name: DescriptionFTPActiveLong
item.original: If this flag is set, the FTP connection is made in active mode. Even if the "ftp-passive" flag is also set, the connection will be made in active mode
item.translated: Hvis denne indstilling er sat vil FTP forbindelser bruge "active mode". Selv hvis flaget "ftp-passive" også er angivet vil forbindelsen blive oprettet i "active mode".

item.name: DescriptionFTPActiveShort
item.original: Toggles the FTP connections method

item.name: DescriptionFTPPassiveLong
item.original: If this flag is set, the FTP connection is made in passive mode, which works better with some firewalls. If the "ftp-regular" flag is also set, this flag is ignored
item.translated: Hvis denne indstilling er sat vil FTP forbindelsen bruge "passive mode", hvilket virker bedre med nogle firewalls. Hvis indstilling "ftp-regular" også er sat ignoreres denne indstilling

item.name: DescriptionFTPPassiveShort
item.original: Toggles the FTP connections method

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordLong
item.original: The password used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_PASSWORD".
item.translated: Kodeordet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_PASSWORD".

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordShort
item.original: Supplies the password used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver kodeordet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameLong
item.original: The username used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_USERNAME".
item.translated: Brugernavnet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_USERNAME".

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameShort
item.original: Supplies the username used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver brugernavnet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionIntegratedAuthenticationLong
item.original: If the server and client both supports integrated authentication, this option enables that authentication method. This is likely only available with windows servers and clients.
item.translated: Hvis klient og server begge understøtter integreret godkendelse, vil denne indstilling aktivere det. Dette virker formentlig kun med Windows servere og klienter.

item.name: DescriptionIntegratedAuthenticationShort
item.original: Use windows integrated authentication to connect to the server
item.translated: Brug Windows integretet godkendelse for at forbinde til serveren

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLLong
item.original: Use this flag to communicate using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over ftp (ftps).
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling for at kommunikere med Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over ftp (ftps)

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLShort
item.original: Instructs Duplicati to use an SSL (ftps) connection

item.name: DisplayName
item.original: FTP based

item.original: The folder {0} was not found, message: {1}

item.original: The file {0} was uploaded but not found afterwards, the file listing returned {1}
item.translated: Filen {0} blev uploaded men ikke fundet efterfølgende, fil listen indeholder {1}

item.name: ListVerifySizeFailure
item.original: The file {0} was uploaded but the returned size was {1} and it was expected to be {2}
item.translated: File {0} blev uploaded men dens størrelse er {1} og den burde være {2}

item.name: DescriptionDisableUploadVerifyShort
item.original: Disable upload verification

item.name: DescriptionDisableUploadVerifyLong
item.original: To protect against network failures, every upload will be attempted verified. Use this option to disable this verfication to make the upload faster by more unsafe.
item.translated: For at beskytte mod netværksfejl vil alle upload operationer blive forsøgt kontrolleret. Brug denne indstilling til at deaktivere verifikationen, og dermed gøre uploads hurtigere men mere usikre.

item.name: ApproveCertificateHashQuestion
item.original: The certificate was not valid ({0}). Do you want to approve the certificate anyway and retry?
item.translated: Certifikatet var ikke gyldigt ({0}). Vil du godkende certifikatet alligevel og forsøge igen?

item.name: CreateMissingFolderQuestion
item.original: The folder does not exist, do you want to create it?
item.translated: Mappen findes ikke, vil du oprette den?

item.name: EmptyHashError
item.original: You have not entered a hash string
item.translated: Du har ikke angivet en hash værdi

item.name: InvalidHashError
item.original: The hash string is not valid, it must be of even length and only contain hex chars (0-9 and a-f)
item.translated: Hash værdien er ikke gyldig, den skal have et lige antal tegn og må kun indeholde hexadecimale tegn (0-9 og a-f)

item.name: folderBrowserDialog.Description
item.original: Select the folder where the backups will be stored
item.translated: Angiv mappen hvor backup data gemmes

item.name: AlternateDestinationMarkerLong
item.original: This option only works when the --{0} option is also specified. If there are alternate paths specified, this option indicates the name of a marker file that must be present in the folder. This can be used to handle situations where an external drive changes drive letter or mount point. By ensuring that a certain file exists, it is possible to prevent writing data to an unwanted external drive. The contents of the file are never examined, only file existence.
item.translated: Denne indstilling virker kun hvis indstillingen --{0} også er aktiveret. Hvis der er angivet alternative stier angiver denne indstilling at der skal findes en markør fil i destinationsmappen. Dette kan bruges til at håndtere situationer hvor et ekstern drev skifter drevbogstav eller monteringsplacering. Ved at kontrollere at en speciel fil findes er det muligt at forhindre at data gemmes på en uønsket placering. Indholdet af filen undersøges aldrig, kun hvorvidt den findes.

item.name: AlternateDestinationMarkerShort
item.original: Look for a file in the destination folder
item.translated: Led efter en fil i destinationsmappen

item.name: AlternateTargetPathsLong
item.original: This option allows multiple targets to be specified. The primary target path is placed before the list of paths supplied with this option. Before starting the backup, each folder in the list is checked for existence and optionally the presence of the marker file supplied by --{0}. The first existing path that optionally contains the marker file is then used as the destination. Multiple destinations are separated with a {1},. On Windows, the path may be a UNC path, and the drive letter may be substituted with an asterisk (*), eg.: "*:\backup", which will examine all drive letters. If a username and password is supplied, the same credentials are used for all destinations.
item.translated: Denne indstilling tillader at flere destinationer angives. Den primære destination placeres foran den liste af destinationer der angives med denne indstilling. Før der startes en backup kontrolleres det hvilke mapper fra listen der findes, og muligvis om en speciel markør fil findes, hvis denne er angivet med {0}. Den første mappe der findes og indeholder markør filen bliver brug som destination. Flere destinationer adskilles med {1}. Under Windows må stien også være en UNC sti, og drevbogstavet kan erstattes med en stjerne (*), f.eks. vil "*:\backup" undersøge alle drev. Hvis et brugernavn og kodeord er angivet bliver det samme brugernavn og kodeord anvendt til alle destinationer.

item.name: AlternateTargetPathsShort
item.original: A list of secondary target paths

item.name: Description
item.original: This backend can read and write data to an file based backend. Allowed formats are "file://hostname/folder" or "file://username:password@hostname/folder". You may supply UNC paths (eg: "file://\\server\folder") or local paths (eg: (win) "file://c:\folder", (linux) "file:///usr/pub/files")
item.translated: Denne backend kan læse og skrive data til en mappe. Tilladte formater er "file://hostname/folder" eller "file://username:password@hostname/folder". Du kan både angive UNC stier (f.eks.: "file://\\server\folder") eller lokale stier (f.eks.: (win) "file://c:\folder", (linux) "file:///usr/pub/files")

item.translated: Kodeordet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_PASSWORD".

item.original: Supplies the password used to connect to the server

item.name: UseMoveForPutLong
item.original: When storing the file, the standard operation is to copy the file and delete the original. This sequence ensures that the operation can be retried if something goes wrong. Activating this option may cause the retry operation to fail. This option has no effect unless the --disable-streaming-transfers options is activated.
item.translated: Når der skal gemmes en fil, er standard proceduren at kopiere filen og slette originalen. Dette sikrer at operationen kan gentages hvis noget går galt. Hvis denne indstilling aktiveres, vil retry funktionen muligvis fejle. Denne indstilling har ingen effekt medmindre indstillingen --disable-streaming-transfers er aktiveret.

item.name: UseMoveForPutShort
item.original: Move the file instead of copying it
item.translated: Flyt filen i stedet for kopiering

unused.item: Bucket navnet "{0}", er ikke et gyldigt værtsnavn og kan ikke anvendes med subdomain url'er. Indstillingerne --{1} og --{2} skifter også subdomain url'er.

Denne destination kan læse og skrive data til Amazon S3. Tilladte formater er (subdomain type): "s3://bucketname.s3.amazonaws.com/prefix" eller "s3://aws_id:aws_key@bucketname.s3.amazonaws.com/prefix". Url-endelses typen godtages også: "s3://s3.amazonaws.com/bucketname/prefix". Hvis servernavnet ikke er s3.amazonaws.com, antages det at der avendes vanity domæner, og bucket navnet forsøges fundet gennem CNAME oplysningerne. Bemærk at hvis dit AWS ID eller Key indeholder ":", "/" eller "@" kan de ikke angives i url'en og skal så angives som separate indstillinger.

item.name: S3EurobucketDescriptionLong
item.original: This flag is only used when creating new buckets. If the flag is set, the bucket is created on a european server. This flag forces the "s3-use-new-style" flag. Amazon charges slightly more for european buckets.
item.translated: Denne indstilling bliver kun anvendt når der oprettes nye buckets. Hvis denne indstilling er sat bliver din bucket oprettet på en europæisk server. Denne indstilling tvinger "s3-use-new-style" indstillingen på. Amazon opkræver en smule mere for brug af europæiske buckets.

item.name: S3EurobucketDescriptionShort
item.original: Use a European server

item.name: S3NewStyleDescriptionLong
item.original: Specify this argument to make the S3 backend use subdomains rather than the previous url prefix method. See the Amazon S3 documentation for more details.
item.translated: Angiv denne indstilling for at få bruge subdomain metoden istedet for den tidligere anvendte url-endelses metode. Se Amazon S3 dokumentationen for flere oplysninger.

item.name: S3NewStyleDescriptionShort
item.original: Use subdomain calling style

item.name: UnableToDecodeBucketnameError
item.original: Unable to determine the bucket name for host: {0}
item.translated: Kunne ikke afgøre bucket navn for værten: {0}

item.name: S3UseRRSDescriptionLong
item.original: This flag toggles the use of the special RRS header. Files stored using RRS are more likely to disapear than those stored normally, but also costs less to store. See the full description here: http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2010/05/19/announcing-amazon-s3-reduced-redundancy-storage/
item.translated: Denne indstilling aktiverer brugen af den specielle RRS header. Filer der gemmes med RRS har en større sandsynlighed for at forsvinde end filer der gemmes normal, men koster også mindre. Se den fulde beskrivelse her: http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2010/05/19/announcing-amazon-s3-reduced-redundancy-storage/

item.name: S3UseRRSDescriptionShort
item.original: Use Reduced Redundancy Storage

item.name: Description_v2
item.original: This backend can read and write data to an Amazon S3 compatible server. Allowed formats are: "s3://bucketname/prefix"

item.name: S3LocationDescriptionLong
item.original: This option is only used when creating new buckets. Use this option to change what region the data is stored in. Amazon charges slightly more for non-US buckets. Known bucket locations: {0}
item.translated: Denne indstilling bruges kun når der oprettes nye buckets. Brug denne indstilling til at ændre den region en bucket oprettes i. Amazon opkræver mere for buckets der ikke er placeret i USA. Kendte bucket regioner: {0}

item.name: S3LocationDescriptionShort
item.original: Specifies S3 location constraints

item.name: S3ServerNameDescriptionLong
item.original: Companies other than Amazon are now supporting the S3 API, meaning that this backend can read and write data to those providers as well. Use this option to set the hostname. Currently known providers are: {0}
item.translated: Andre firmaer end Amazon understøtter nu S3 API'et, hvilket betyder at denne backend også kan læse og skrive til disse servere. Brug denne indstilling til at sætte hostnavnet. Kendte udbydere: {0}

item.original: Specifies an alternate S3 server name

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLLong
item.original: Use this flag to communicate using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over http (https). Note that bucket names containing a period has problems with SSL connections.
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling for at kommunikere med Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over http (https). Bemærk at bucket navnet med punktum kan give problemer med SSL forbindelser.

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLShort
item.original: Instructs Duplicati to use an SSL (https) connection
item.translated: Sætter Duplicati til at anvende SSL (https) forbindelse

Ved brug af en europæiske bucket skal navnet være med små bogstaver.

item.name: BucketnameCaseWarning
BucketnameNotPrefixedWarning
item.original: The bucket name does not start with your user ID. To avoid using a bucket owned by another user, it is recommended that you put your user ID in front of the bucket name. Do you want to insert the user ID in front of the bucket name?
item.translated: Bucket navnet starter ikke med dit bruger id. For at undgå at du skriver i en bucket der tilhører en anden bruger, anbefales det at du sætter dit bruger id foran i bucket navnet. Vil du have dit bruger id indsat i starten af bucket navnet?

item.translated: Du skal indtaste dit AWS Access ID. Du kan klikke på linket til højre for at åbne AWS login siden og hente det.

item.name: EmptyAWSKeyError
item.original: You must enter your AWS Secret Key. You may click the link to the right to open the AWS login page, and retrieve it.
item.translated: Du skal indtaste dit AWS Secret Key. Du kan klikke på linket til højre for at åbne AWS login siden og hente det.

item.name: EmptyBucketnameError
item.original: You must enter a name for the bucket. You must use a unique name for each backup. You may enter any name you like.
item.translated: Du skal angive et bucket navn. Du skal bruge et unikt navn til hver backup. Du kan angive et vilkårligt navn.

item.name: HostnameInvalidWarning
item.original:
The supplied bucket name, "{0}", does not appear to be a valid hostname label. This may still work if the non-subdomain calling style is used, but it is not recommended.
Do you want to continue anyway?
item.translated:
Det angivne bucket navn, "{0}", ser ikke ud til at være et gyldigt værtsnavn. Dette kan måske virke hvis der ikke anvendes subdomain opslag, men det anbefales ikke.
Vil du fortsætte alligevel?

item.name: HostnameInvalidWithNonUSBucketOptionError
item.original: Non-US buckets require that the bucket names are valid hostname labels, but the supplied bucket name, "{0}", is not a valid hostname label. Either change the bucketname or use the default bucket region.
item.translated: Hvis en bucket er placeret udenfor USA kræves det at bucketnavnet også er et gyldigt servernavn. Skift enten bucketnavnet, eller brug standard regionen.

item.name: MonoRequiresExistingBucket
item.original: A bug in Mono versions older than 2.4.3, prevents the backend from detecting and missing buckets. Due to this, it is recommended that you create the bucket. Do you want to create the bucket now?
item.translated: En fejl i Mono version 2.4.3 eller ældre, forhindrer at programmet kan opdage manglende buckets. Pga. dette anbefales det at du opretter en bucket nu. Vil du oprette en bucket nu?

item.name: NewS3RequiresLowerCaseError
item.original: The new amazon s3 API requires that bucket names are all lower case.
item.translated: Når der anvendes den nye Amazon S3 API, kræves det at alle bucket navne udelukkende består af små bogstaver.

item.name: NonUSBucketsRequireLowerCaseError
item.original: Non-US buckets require that the bucket name is in lower case.
item.translated: Hvis en bucket er placeret udenfor USA kræves det at bucketnavnet er med små bogstaver.

item.name: Description
item.original: Supports connections to a WEBDAV enabled web server, using the HTTP protocol. Allowed formats are "webdav://hostname/folder" or "webdav://username:password@hostname/folder".
item.translated: Kan forbinde til en webserver med WEBDAV understøttelse via HTTP protokollen. Tilladte formater er "webdav://hostname/folder" og "webdav://username:password@hostname/folder".

item.name: DescriptionForceDigestLong
item.original: Using the HTTP Digest authentication method allows the user to authenticate with the server, without sending the password in clear. However, a man-in-the-middle attack is easy, because the HTTP protocol specifies a fallback to Basic authentication, which will make the client send the password to the attacker. Using this flag, the client does not accept this, and always uses Digest authentication or fails to connect.
item.translated: Ved at bruge HTTP Digest godkendelse kan brugeren godkendes af serveren, uden at skulle sende kodeordet som klartekst. Men det er stadig muligt at udføre et man-in-the-middle angreb, fordi HTTP protokollen tillader at der skiftes til Basic godkendelse, hvilket vil gøre at kodeordet sendes til angriberen. Ved at angive denne indstilling, vil Duplicati nægte at gøre dette og altid anvende Digest godkendelse eller undlade at oprette forbindelsen.

item.name: DescriptionForceDigestShort
item.original: Force the use of the HTTP Digest authentication method
item.translated: Tvinger brugen af HTTP Digest godkendelse

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordLong
item.original: The password used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_PASSWORD".
item.translated: Kodeordet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_PASSWORD".

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordShort
item.original: Supplies the password used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver kodeordet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameLong
item.original: The username used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_USERNAME".
item.translated: Brugernavnet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_USERNAME".

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameShort
item.original: Supplies the username used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver brugernavnet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionIntegratedAuthenticationLong
item.original: If the server and client both supports integrated authentication, this option enables that authentication method. This is likely only available with windows servers and clients.
item.translated: Hvis server og klient begge understøtter integreret godkendelse, kan det aktiveres med denne indstilling. Dette er formentlig kun tilgængeligt med windows servere og klienter.

item.name: DescriptionIntegratedAuthenticationShort
item.original: Use windows integrated authentication to connect to the server
item.translated: Brug Windows integreret godkendelse til at forbinde med

item.name: DisplayName
item.original: WEBDAV based

item.original: The folder path contains backslashes, which are known to cause problems. Do you want to convert the backslashes to forward slashes?
item.translated: Mappestien indeholder bagudvendte skråstreger som ofte skaber problemer. Vil du konvertere bagudvendte skråstreger til fremadrettede skråstreger?

item.translated: Du har ikke angivet en hash værdi

item.name: InvalidHashError
item.original: The hash string is not valid, it must be of even length and only contain hex chars (0-9 and a-f)
item.translated: Hash værdien er ikke gyldig, den skal have et lige antal tegn og må kun indeholde hexadecimale tegn (0-9 og a-f)

item.name: LeadingSlashWarning
item.original: The folder path starts with a forward slash, which is not required and known to cause problems. Do you want the leading slash to be removed?
item.translated: Mappenavnet starter med en skråstreg, hvilket ikke er krævet og kan skabe problemer. Skal skråstregen fjernes?

item.name: Description
item.original: This backend can read and write data to an SSH based backend, using SFTP. Allowed formats are "ssh://hostname/folder" or "ssh://username:password@hostname/folder".
item.translated: Denne backend kan læse og skrive data til en SSH server via SFTP. Tilladte formater er "ssh://hostname/folder" eller ssh://username:password@hostname/folder".

item.name: DescriptionDebugToConsoleLong
item.original: The SSH backend relies on an external program (sftp) to work. Since the external program may change at any time, this may break the backend. Enable this option to get debug information about the ssh connection written to the console. Only used if the --use-sftp-application option is supplied.
item.translated: SSH forbindelsen afhænger af et eksternt program (sftp). Eftersom det eksterne program kan ændres på et vilkårligt tidspunkt, kan forbindelsen holde op med at virke. Aktiver denne indstillinger for at få oplysninger om ssh forbindelsen i konsollen. Dette virker kun hvis --use-sftp-application indstillingen er aktiv.

item.name: DescriptionDebugToConsoleShort
item.original: Prints debug info to the console

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordLong
item.original: The password used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_PASSWORD".
item.translated: Kodeordet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_PASSWORD".

item.name: DescriptionFTPPasswordShort
item.original: Supplies the password used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver kodeordet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameLong
item.original: The username used to connect to the server. This may also be supplied as the environment variable "FTP_USERNAME".
item.translated: Brugernavnet anvendt for at logge ind på serveren. Dette kan også angives via miljøvariablen "FTP_USERNAME".

item.name: DescriptionFTPUsernameShort
item.original: Supplies the username used to connect to the server
item.translated: Angiver brugernavnet der anvendes til at logge på serveren

item.name: DescriptionSFTPCommandLong
item.original: The full path to the "sftp" application. Only used if the --use-sftp-application option is supplied.
item.translated: Den fulde sti til "sftp" programmet. Denne indstilling anvendes kun hvis --use-sftp-application indstillingen er aktiv.

item.name: DescriptionSFTPCommandShort
item.original: The path to the "sftp" program

item.name: DescriptionSshkeyfileLong
item.original: Points to a valid OpenSSH keyfile. If the file is encrypted, the password supplied is used to decrypt the keyfile. If this option is supplied, the password is not used to authenticate. This option only works when using the managed SSH client.
item.translated: Angiver stien til en gyldig OpenSSH nøglefil. Hvis filen er krypteret anvendes det angivne kodeord til at dekryptere filen. Hvis denne indstilling angives bliver kodeordet ikke anvendt til at logge på med. Denne indstilling virker kun med managed SSH.

item.name: DescriptionSshkeyfileShort
item.original: Uses a SSH private key to authenticate
item.translated: Brug en SSH nøgle til at logge på

item.name: DescriptionSSHOptionsLong
item.original: Supply any extra commandline arguments, which are passed unaltered to the ssh application. Only used if the --use-sftp-application option is supplied.
item.translated: Angiver ekstra kommandolinie argumenter, som sendes direkte til ssh programmet. Bruges kun hvis --use-sftp-application indstillingen er aktiveret.

item.name: DescriptionSSHOptionsShort
item.original: Extra options to the ssh commands

item.name: DescriptionTransferTimeoutLong
item.original: The SSH backend relies on an external program (sftp) to work. Since the external program may hang, Duplicati must use a timeout to detect a stall in the external program. Use this option to adjust the timeout. Minimum allowed value is one minute, maximum allowed is one hour. Only used if the --use-sftp-application option is supplied.
item.translated: SSH forbindelsen afhænger af et eksternt program (sftp). Eftersom det eksterne program kan risikere at hænge, skal Duplicati bruge en timeout værdi for at opdage at programmet stopper med at svare. Brug denne indstilling for at justere timeout værdien. Mindste tilladte værdi er et minut, højeste er en time. Bruges kun hvis --use-sftp-application indstillingen er aktiveret.

item.name: DescriptionTransferTimeoutShort
item.original: Sets the timeout for transfering a file

item.name: DescriptionUnmanagedLong
item.original: Set this flag to use the sftp command from --sftp-command to communicate with the server. Setting this flag also requires that --disable-streaming-transfers is set
item.translated: Benyt denne indstilling til at anvende programmet fra --sftp-command til at kommunikere med serveren. Hvis denne indstilling er aktiv skal --disable-streaming-transfers også være sat.

item.name: DescriptionUnmanagedShort
item.original: Use an external sftp application

item.name: DisplayName
item.original: SSH based

item.name: SftpNotAutodetectedWarning
item.original: The sftp application could not be located, please enter the path manually
item.translated: SFTP programmet blev ikke fundet, indtast venligst stien manuelt

item.name: SftpProgramNotFoundError
UseEmptyPathWarning
item.original: You have not entered a path to the SFTP application. This will use the default path to the SFTP application. The SFTP application could not be found during system probing. Are you sure this is what you want?
item.translated: Du har ikke indtastet en sti til SFTP programmet. Dette vil anvende standard stien til SFTP programmet. Der blev ikke fundet et SFTP program under systemundersøgelsen. Er du sikker på at det er som du ønsker?

item.original: Settings for the SSH backend

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: SSH

item.name: CreateMissingFolderQuestion
item.original: The folder does not exist, do you want to create it?
item.translated: Den angivne mappe findes ikke. Vil du oprette den?

item.name: MissingSCPWarning
item.original:
Duplicati was unable to verify the existence of the sftp program. sftp may work regardless, if it is located in the system search path.
Do you want to continue anyway?
item.translated:
Duplicati kunne ikke verificere at sftp programmet findes. SFTP virker måske alligevel hvis programmet findes i systemets søgesti.
Vil du fortsætte alligevel?

item.name: PageDescription
item.original: On this page you can select where to store the backup data.
item.translated: På denne side kan du angive hvor data skal gemmes

item.name: PageTitle
item.original: Backup storage options

item.name: PasswordRequiredManagedError
item.original: A password is required when using the managed SSH option and no keyfile is supplied
item.translated: Et kodeord er krævet når der anvendes managed SSH og der ikke anvendes nøglefil

item.original: Use SSL

item.name: AcceptAnyHash.Text
item.original: Accept any invalid certificate

item.name: AcceptSpecifiedHash.Text
item.original: Accept this certificate hash

item.name: Description
item.original: This backend can read and write data to a Tahoe-LAFS based backend. Allowed format is "tahoe://hostname:port/uri/$DIRCAP".
item.translated: Denne destination kan læse og skrive data til Tahoe-LAFS. Tilladte format er "tahoe://hostname:port/uri/$DIRCAP".

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLLong
item.original: Use this flag to communicate using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over http (https).
item.translated: Brug denne indstilling for at kommunikere med Secure Socket Layer (SSL) over http (https)

item.name: DescriptionUseSSLShort
item.original: Instructs Duplicati to use an SSL (https) connection

item.name: Displayname
item.original: Tahoe-LAFS based

item.name: MissingFolderError
item.original: The folder {0} was not found, message: {1}

item.name: UnexpectedJsonFragmentType
item.original: Found the Json fragment {0} but expected {1}

item.name: UnrecognizedUriError
item.original: Unsupported URL format, must start with "/uri/URI:DIR2:"

item.name: UriHasQueryError
item.original: The supplied URL contains a query, which is not allowed
item.translated: URL'en indeholder en query, hvilket ikke er tilladt

item.name: ApproveCertificateHashQuestion
item.original: The certificate was not valid ({0}). Do you want to approve the certificate anyway and retry?
item.translated: Certifikatet var ikke gyldigt ({0}). Vil du godkende certifikatet alligevel og forsøge igen?

item.name: CreateMissingFolderQuestion
item.original: The folder does not exist, do you want to create it?
item.translated: Mappen findes ikke, vil du oprette den?

item.name: EmptyFolderPathError
item.original: You must enter the name of the folder where the data should be stored
item.translated: Du skal indtaste navnet på den mappe hvor data skal gemmes i

item.name: EmptyFolderPathWarning
item.original: You have not entered a folder, this will store all files in the root directory of the server. Do you want to continue without a folder path?
item.translated: Du har ikke indtastet en mappe, dette vil gemme alle filer i serverens rod-mappe. Vil du forsætte uden en mappe?

item.name: EmptyHashError
item.original: You have not entered a hash string
item.translated: Du har ikke angivet en hash værdi

item.name: InvalidFolderPathError
item.original: The folder path is invalid, it must start with "{0}"
item.translated: Mappe stien er ugyldig, den skal starte med "{0}"

item.name: InvalidHashError
item.original: The hash string is not valid, it must be of even length and only contain hex chars (0-9 and a-f)
item.translated: Hash værdien er ikke gyldig, den skal have et lige antal tegn og må kun indeholde hexadecimale tegn (0-9 og a-f)
